description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Honey & Lemon Pork Midloin Chops recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork chop,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,BBQ,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Grilled Honey & Lemon Pork Midloin Chops Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large lemon, finely grated rind (plus 1/3 cup of juice)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine lemon, honey and garlic in a jug and whisk to combine. Arrange pork chops in a shallow ceramic dish and pour over marinade. Turn to coat and set aside for 20 minutes.

Heat a chargrill pan or BBQ on medium. Remove pork chops from marinade allowing excess to drain off. Cook for 4 mins each side or until well browned and sticky. Serve with potato and sweet potato mash.
To make mash, put potatoes into a saucepan and cover with cold water. Place over high heat and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 mins or until tender. Drain and roughly mash.
